name: Rocs-Hardcore-Fulgora
title: Hard Fulgora
author: thesixthroc
description:
Difficulty tweaks for Fulgora. Lightning storms are stronger, and lightning rods are locked behind a new technology to incentivize building a small science chain on Fulgora.

Certain dependencies are intended to be included by default, but are listed as optional for better customizability. To get the full experience, enable this mod via the Space Age: Hard Mode modpack.
